Text:
Any requests for my next one?

I was thinking one of these:
- Ninja Assassin
- The Red Baron
- Zombieland (I've been playing a lot of World at War lately :D)
- Surrogates

I might also do a nice little 'Disaster Pack' with 853x versions of '2012', 'The Core', and 'The Day After Tomorrow' ... just something I've been thinking about! :P
Ninja Assassin was a awesome movie.  I havent seen Surrogates so that would be a good one to
those subtitles are part of the movie

Very good 'Stevejoe11' ... that's why they're called "hardcoded."

*pats on the head and gives him a cookie*
...so you dont really need to put it in the title...

I put it in the title because about 90% of the 'ipod' or PSP (or any handheld) conversions DO NOT have the subtitles hardcoded or viewable in any way.

Most people WANT the subtitles, so I put it in the title so people know that my upload is different from the others.
Great quality. Will seed to 1.5.nnThanks again VoV!
